name: PostProcessingOverrides
author: kafeijao
description:
__**Features**__:
- Enable/Disable/Force/Override Post processing configurations for the current world (persistent).
- Choose between Original, Global, Custom, and Off for which Post Processing configuration type should be use for the current world.
- Chose which Configuration Type a world gets when you join for the first time (via melon preferences).
- While using Global or Custom, you can configure the settings to be: Off, Original, or Override.

Check [README.md](https://github.com/kafeijao/Kafe_CVR_Mods/tree/master/PostProcessingOverrides) for more in-depth info.
changelog:
- Added bloom threshold override.
- Fixed not overriding the PP in some worlds.
